title: The Field - Lynne McTaggart (2008 edition)
description:
The Field by Lynne McTaggart - 2008 edition with the latest preface
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I guess this is one ebook that many people have been waiting for. It always amused me that, despite the popularity of this book amongst the New Age Physics community, I haven't found a single copy of this ebook on the popular torrent websites. Maybe it's out there somewhere, but I'm guessing it's under a private tracker. So, I decided to do something to remedy the situation. Spent more than 3 hours scanning the damn book. This is for those of you who have been eagerly  searching for it but didnt get it... until now :-)

Let me say I have nothing against Lynne McTaggart. I think she did a great job of compiling all the relevant information pertaining to the Zero Point Energy Field into one neat little package. I just think it's time more people got their hands on this book. Even if it doesn't drastically change your life, it WILL greatly alter your perception of this universe...

To find more info on technical applications of the ZPF, please visit websites like:

www.keelynet.com
www.rexresearch.com
www.overunity.com
